channel.title: PAR:VIV on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in PAR:VIV on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Vivendi Hit by EU Chargesheet for Closing Lagardere Deal Too Soon
item.description: Vivendi SE has been hit with a formal European Union complaint for allegedly closing its takeover of Lagardere SA before obtaining the green light from Brussels.
